npcs.name: Kayl of the Circle
utterances: How dare you break the circle! You have chosen your fate. Prepare yourself!
Good show, but it's over now. You are no match for my strength. I will... Wait! Wh... who's there?
T... Tayil! How did you find me?

npcs.name: Tayil N'Velex
utterances: I knew we'd find you, Kayl. I see you've been doing well for yourself. Too bad your treasures are about to become mine!
That's not important, Qeynosian. What is important is that your days upon Norrath are at an end. Prepare to die!
Well done, <player name>. That fool Kayl had no idea what was coming! The Tunarians are finished on this island.

Yes, our efforts have been a success. The island is ours, and so is this fine assortment of valuables! The Overlord will hear of your bravery, <player name>. As promised, here is a reward that will  prove useful in your future adventures.
